title: Calories in a Spicy McChicken
meta_description: Discover calories in a spicy McChicken, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Spicy McChicken sandwich: crispy chicken patty with spicy sauce, lettuce, on a sesame seed bun; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A Spicy McChicken sandwich has about 410 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in a spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 410 kcal for one standard sandwich.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a spicy McChicken?
faqs.a: Around 860 mg, mostly from the breading and sauce.

faqs.q: Does the spicy McChicken have trans fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g per sandwich from the fried patty.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to regular McChicken?
faqs.a: Similar at ~400 kcal; spice adds negligible calories but more flavor.
